Interests

Apart from being a "passionate tech nerd", I enjoy most of my time being outdoors with my wife and our dog. We enjoy hiking, playing basketball and walk around our neighborhood. I am an avid mountain biker; I love to practice enduro and downhill mostly!

When in indoors, I like to watch series/movies based on real life events, sports, militar and thiller genres. Enjoy cooking (not very elaborated meals) and spend a large amount of my free time exploring/learning the latest technology advancements in the DevOps/Automation/Cloud world, on last months also everything related to Data Science.
